metadata.title: CVE-2014-3672 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - negligible
metadata.description:
The qemu implementation in libvirt before 1.3.0 and Xen allows local guestOS users to cause a denial of service (host disk consumption) by writing tostdout or stderr.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-3672` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libvirt-bin - 1.3.1-1ubuntu10
libvirt0 - 1.3.1-1ubuntu10
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libvirt package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.3.1-1ubuntu10').
qemu: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
